itunes:title: Acts Week 2 with Christine Caine
title: Acts Week 2 with Christine Caine
description:
It’s the second week of our Acts series, and Raechel and Amanda continue their conversation with author and speaker, Christine Caine. They read the stories of how the early Church grew and was strengthened by the power of the Holy Spirit, even in the midst of great persecution. Listen and be encouraged that the Holy Spirit is still acting—it is alive and well in God’s people today and always, always points us to Jesus.   


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Acts reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Acts collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/acts-week-2-with-christine-caine
